pages.desc:
All commands should start with .(comma)!
 **ex)** `.all deathwing`

fields.name: `.[CardName]`
fields.value:
Search a card image that most matches with 'card name'.
 **ex)** `.thalnos` ➔ Bloodmage Thalnos

fields.name: `.quiz`
fields.value: Guess a card name with a piece of card image!

fields.name: `.name [CardName]`
fields.value:
Search **all** cards with their name including '[CardName]'
 **ex)** `.name ragnaros`

fields.name: `.all [keyword]`
fields.value:
Search **all** cards that includes [keyword].
Card texts are also included for searching, not only card name.
 **ex)** `.all battlecry`

fields.name: You can add class condition using doublequotes(" ") when using search commands.
`.quiz`
fields.value: Guess a card name with a piece of card image!

fields.name: `.quizconfig`
fields.value:
Config a card pool that appears in quiz.
(e.g. standard/wild, card rarity-legendary/rare/...)

fields.name: `.config`
fields.value: Config search result's card displayed per page, standard/wild, language.
